products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tiffany smoulder's dark charcoal shade is the height of style, with its softly curving pattern and lightweight yet durable fabric, and offers a modern, up-to-date style that just can't be outdone. Use it for privacy, gently tilting the louvres when you'd like more light. Use in a modern dining room, set against white walls and pale soft furnishings, with the occasional silver or red accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and calming, the soft white of the tiffany flawless is an understated way of adding pattern and texture to a window. This soothing blind is deceptively robust, despite its light appearance, and slides easily along the rail when the louvres are tilted or moved. The flawless will indeed look flawless amongst soft greys and cool silvers in a bedroom or home office; or sit amongst icy blues, baby pinks, or soft lilacs for a pretty, romantic appearance in a master bedroom or guest room.

It is a member of the roma (fr) range, a flame-retardant collection perfect for commercial properties, yet also stylish enough to use in the home. Transform a boring playroom into a child's haven by including the azure in a bright and colourful decor scheme, teaming it with other primary and secondary colours for a fun and vibrant setting.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Vertical Blind
products.description: Gentle by name, gentle by nature, this cream offering from the tiffany range is soft in texture but hardy in quality; yet despite its light hue, offers character and intrigue using a curved, wispy pattern that covers the length of the fabric.
